results.content:
Your explanation is really good but one tip to make it awesome is that use a famous ide(or something common in use) as an editor I recommend eclipse or netBeans because of two reasons 1) these ides' have lots of good features (javafx...) if you teach us with these ides' we learn both (java language and an awesome ide)
2) these ides' have number line in the margine of the corner which is easier for us to understand your code because in some cases you start a video with a sample code wich you made it already and we dont know which part of the code we are looking at it (is it the beginning, middle, or bottom)
in overall I really like your teaching style and your knowledge!

Good Luck!

results.content: Till now it was good knowledge sharing.  Interested to move forward
